#labels DownloadIssue,UpdateIssue
= Introduction =
We fresh download the file to replace the old file to solve download or update issues.


= Details =
Steps:
1. Right click to the file which you want to replace;
2.choose replace with/Latest from Repository
3.After replace the file, go to Build Path/Project/jreality to set the Native library location of jreality. The Native library location of jreality is in jreality/jni; 
4.Some libraries' Native library location also need to be set.
